General.Name: Reviv3 Procare Company
General.Description: Reviv3 Procare Company manufactures, markets, distributes, and sells hair and skin care, and hearing enhancement and protection products in the United States, Canada, Europe, and Asia. Its hair care products include PREP shampoos, PRIME conditioners, and TREAT maintenance care products. The company also offers BOOST to deliver nutrients and enhance circulation to the scalp; MEND deep hair repair masks for added moisture; and PROTECT, a heat protectant product to prevent damage from irons and dryers, as well as thickening sprays for giving hair more volume and body. In addition, it provides creams and lotions; and perfumes, mouthwashes, and deodorants, as well as shaving, makeup, and nail products. Further, the company offers hearing enhancement and protection products, including ear plugs, ear muffs, and ear buds under the AXIL brand. It serves business-to-business salon through its network of domestic and international distributors; and direct-to-consumer marketing programs through its ecommerce site and various third-party online platforms, as well as retail chains. Reviv3 Procare Company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Alhambra, California.
General.Address: 9480 Telstar Avenue, El Monte, CA, United States, 91731
